Interface IDAOProfile

  • All Superinterfaces:

    All Known Implementing Classes:

    public interface IDAOProfile
extends IDAO
    Interface responsible for the activities in the particular database of user profile

        java.lang.String editProfile(int userId,
                             java.lang.String name,
                             java.lang.String lastname,
                             int ci,
                             int geographicalRegion,
                             java.lang.String address,
                             java.lang.String birthdate,
                             java.lang.String gender,
                             java.lang.String email,
                             java.lang.String phone)
        Abstract method which is responsible for editing a user profile
        Parameters:
        userId - id of the user
        name - new name of the user
        lastname - new lastname of the user
        ci - new identification number of the user
        geographicalRegion - new geographical region of the user
        address - new address of the user
        birthdate - new birthdate of the user
        gender - new gender of the user
        email - new email of the user
        phone - new phone of the user
        Returns:
        String with information about the data base
